The Scholar-Soldier

A commitment to excellence, discipline, and the quiet responsibility of leadership.

I am a graduate of St Andrew's Junior College and a Commissioned Officer in the Singapore Armed Forces. My path has not been one of mere accumulation of accolades, but a deliberate pursuit of understandingâ€”understanding the systems that govern us, the history that shapes us, and the people we serve.

Leadership, to me, is not a rank. It is the decision to take ownership of outcomes that affect others. Whether leading a platoon or representing a student body, the principle remains constant: Standards are set by what we condone, not what we command.
